text:
That left a bad taste in my mouth. We loved the food so much last time that we decided to order take out. We were just told over the phone that they "can't really do that right now" and to call back in 20 minutes.  So many other ways to go about that.

I can understand if you're busy and that we may have to wait longer to pick up, but you always have time to take an order. It pains me to leave this review, but you've forced us to go elsewhere.
